itb.akadquarium

Class AquariumObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • itb.akadquarium.AquariumObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Coin, FishFood, Guppy, Piranha, Snail

    public abstract class AquariumObject
extends java.lang.Object
    Class itb.akadquarium.AquariumObject. This class is used as the abstraction class for another aquarium objects for example: itb.akadquarium.Guppy, itb.akadquarium.Piranha, itb.akadquarium.Snail, itb.akadquarium.FishFood, etc

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      private double x
      x coordinate of aquarium object.
      private double y
      y coordinate of aquarium object.

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance(AquariumObject aquariumObject)
        This method calculates the distance between two objects. Distance is defined as the square of the sum of the difference between x (abscissa values) and y (ordinate values) of both objects.
        Parameters:
        aquariumObject - is the itb.akadquarium.AquariumObject
        Returns:
        distance

      • getTimeNow

        long getTimeNow()
        Get the current time.
        Returns:
        current time in millisecond.

      • isIntersect

        public boolean isIntersect(AquariumObject aquariumObject)
        This method will check whether these both objects intersect. Intersect is defined as if square of the difference between x and y position of both object is less than or equal to square of its radius.
        Parameters:
        aquariumObject - is the itb.akadquarium.AquariumObject
        Returns:
        TRUE if both object intersect, otherwise FALSE

      • isIntersect

        public boolean isIntersect(double pX,
                           double pY,
                           double r)
        This method will check whether these two point intersect. Intersect is defined as if the square of the difference between x and y coordinate is less than or equal to square of its radius.
        Parameters:
        pX - is the abscissa
        pY - is the ordinate
        r - is the radius
        Returns:
        TRUE if both points intersect, otherwise FALSE

      • draw

        void draw(java.awt.Graphics g,
          java.awt.image.BufferedImage img)
        This method will draw the aquarium object on the aquarium while the game is running.
        Parameters:
        g - is Graphics
        img - is BufferedImage
